pullRequest.title: Release/2.1.1
pullRequest.bodyText:
Staging for 2.1.1 release
Deployment

Test pass complete
Update version to remove RC tagging 48f4f26
Merge to master
Deploy to VSTS

Execute pipeline (link here)
Promote to release (link here)


Deploy to Maven Central

Inspect artifact
Close staging repo
Release & auto-drop


Merge to dev #1019
Create tag & release in GitHub

commit.message: Added DCF code to newly migrated LocalMSALController
Move BrokerActivity manifest entry to common (#987)
Remove bad_token suberror from fake http response for testing
Add constant for b2c user impersonation scope
Return from word on account added

Add additional suberrors which ESTS could return to map to MSAL CPP sub error constants (#990)

* Add additional suberrors which ESTS could return to map to MSAL CPP sub error constants

* Made pop internal constructor public

* Address comments
Telemetry emit for exception, other suggestions

Merge pull request #983 from AzureAD/t-fadura/dcf-main

Device Code Flow Final PR
Add app-name and app-ver headers to /auth and /token requests

Handle full authority URL properly (#991)

* Handle full authority URL properly

* Address comments

* shorten code

Merge pull request #992 from AzureAD/shahzaibj/app-name-and-version

Add app-name and app-ver headers to /auth and /token requests
Rename method to change device time

Merge pull request #982 from AzureAD/shahzaibj/extensive-test-utils

Add (a lot) more UI test utilities and Test Infrastructure Improvements. See description for complete context!

Improving error messaging around SSL issues, pointing to docs (#995)

* Improving error messaging around SSL issues, pointing to docs

* Using 'go' link

* Use a constant, use string concat

* Move constant to constants file. Runs code formatter

Closes MSAL/#1011 (#1001)

* Closes #1011

* Tidy up visibility modifiers in class

* Adding nullability annots

* Synchronize method calls which touch static variables what may be
manipulated by another thread
Don't recompile regular expressions if possible.

Merge pull request #1004 from AzureAD/adjoh/make-patterns-constant

Don't recompile regular expressions if possible.

Android/token manipulation (#1003)

* added utility function for token manipulation

* added comments and modify the editTokenSignature method.

* using existing methods in TestUtils to avoid duplication of method.

* Added java documentation for the public methods and updated logic of randomizeCharacterInTokenSignature method.

* Added final keyword for the variables used in the file.

An approach to triggering fewer duplicate command errors (#1012)

* Adds license to file

* Add final + nullability annots to existing impl

* Adds a BiConsumer interface with license infor + javadoc

* ResultFuture impl

* Rename method

* Integrates into CommandDispatcher

* Resolving TODO

* Removing commented out code

* Adds javadoc to ResultFuture

* Clear consumers list after setting result

* Convert RuntimeException to ExecutionException (Requires MSAL changes)

* Fix for potential threading issue

* Fix spelling in comment

* Remove duplicative put call

* Inverting conditional (compacting)

* Return the throwable to the callback, if nonnull

Create and use a null-safe StringUtil.equalsIngoreCase method. (#997)

* Create and use a null-safe StringUtil.equalsIngoreCase method.

* Create and use a null-safe StringUtil.equalsIngoreCase method.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            - No longer query well known config to obtain token endpoint - build it manually instead
          
          
            
            - No longer query well known config to obtain token endpoint - build it manually instead.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,3 +1,12 @@
+Version 2.1.1
+----------
+- Introduces result sharing to minimize duplicate_command errors.
+- No longer query well known config to obtain token endpoint - build it manually instead

commit.message: Add utils for CP device registration and enrollment
Add more utilities for UI Tests
Add ui test utils for 1p apps as well as Settings screen

Preparing API side of DCF protocol, added some skeleton classes
